biotools.summary: Model-based statistical software package for identifying population sub-division and assigning individuals to populations, on the basis of their genotypes at co-dominant marker loci. The underlying population genetic model is appropriate for out-crossing diploid organisms.

bioschemas.name: Partition
bioschemas.summary: Model-based statistical software package for identifying population sub-division and assigning individuals to populations, on the basis of their genotypes at co-dominant marker loci. The underlying population genetic model is appropriate for out-crossing diploid organisms.
